title: Eye Spring
summaries: The Eye Spring is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that summons an Eyeball Spring pet to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Eyeball Spring spins its tentacles to catch up to the player. The Eye Spring has a 1/15 (6.67%) / 1/10 (10%) chance of being dropped by Eyezors during a Solar Eclipse.

statistics.Sell: 3 GC
